thread.title: China allows Xi to remain president indefinitely

title: China allows Xi to remain president indefinitely
text:
China allows Xi to remain president indefinitely 9:45am GMT - 02:27 
China’s parliament passed a constitutional amendment on Sunday, removing presidential term limits, allowing President Xi Jinping to remain in office indefinitely. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China’s parliament passed a constitutional amendment on Sunday, removing presidential term limits, allowing President Xi Jinping to remain in office indefinitely. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2p3QHle
